mapper.select: select count(1) as totalcnt from VTCONNECTION where (VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
select * from VTCONNECTION where (VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by VCONNID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY
select count(1) as totalcnt from VTUSER where USER_ROLE = 'USER' and (UNAME like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')

select a.*, a.REG_DT as CHAR_CRE_DT from VTUSER a where USER_ROLE = 'USER' and (UNAME like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%') order by VIEWID desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${rows} ROWS ONLY
select count(1) as totalcnt from VTUSER where USER_ROLE = 'MANAGER' and (UNAME like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')

select a.*, a.REG_DT as CHAR_CRE_DT from VTUSER a where USER_ROLE = 'MANAGER' and (UNAME like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{searchVal}||'%') order by VIEWID desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${rows} ROWS ONLY
